user_query: income thank you hi I'm Bernard Garrett I'd like to speak with Mr. Reed please I'm sorry Mr. Reed is I may take a message I have pretty good eyesight and I can clearly read the nameplate on his desk Mr. Reed can't meet with you right now Mr. Reed do I know you uh no but you know Mr. Barker I like a loan to buy one of his buildings keep looking you're going to find yourself another building do you use my name to try and get a loan from Mr. Reed at Mid-City Bank yes and do you think that follows normal business customs if I was following normal business customs I'd still be a shoe shine boy in Texas sir Reed wants to see you at the bank in the morning to sign off on that loan I told him I'd act as guarantor because normal business customs are in place to screw people like you Mr. Garrett you went to see Reed knowing the deck was stacked because you have that much confidence in this deal that tells me all I need to know about you two minutes um I'm not your wife what do you want from me man look I like seeing black men succeed sometimes they even invest some of my own money to back well if you can't finish the work or rent the units I'll make the debt what are you doing here just doing some renovations on the empty apartment and you can tell that Mick that owns this place when he goes jacking the rent he ain't jacking mine yes ma'am Mr. Barker was very clear about your lease when he sold me the building don't you sass me boy this is a white building you can't own this place I
